Kentucky Fried Chicken Job Applications
Team Members
Our team members work as part of a team that provides excellent service and high-quality food in a clean, friendly and fun atmosphere. As a front-of-house team member, you'll prepare products, keep the store clean, serve guests and ring up orders.
Job Benefits
Meal Discount Free uniform shirts Advancement opportunities Paid vacations Competitive pay Great work atmosphere
SEARCH AND APPLY FOR KFC TEAM MEMBER JOBS NOW!
Assistant Managers
The Assistant Manager is the key support person to Restaurant Manager and they will:
Enforce the standards of QSC and safeguard the integrity of the brands Execute operational systems Fulfill accountabilities delegated by Restaurant Manager Assist in development of Shift Leaders and crew Role-model the standards of performance, appearance, and behavior at all times Contributes to achieving profitability through cost controls and shift management. Shift control is a core function of all Managers
SEARCH AND APPLY FOR KFC ASSISTANT MANAGER JOBS NOW!
Managers
The Restaurant Manager provides additional management coverage of operating hours and direct supervision of operations in an individual restaurant. Focal points include:
Driving excellence in customer service Maintaining company standards in product and facility specifications Supervising food handling procedures and operational processes Exercising basic, shift-to-shift financial control to meet the restaurant profit margin targets
In addition, a Manager assumes full responsibility for specific financial controls, crew training assignments and the screening of prospective employees.
The Restaurant Manager performs hands-on operational work on an on-going basis to train employees, respond to customer service needs or otherwise role model appropriate skills and behaviors in the restaurant.
SEARCH AND APPLY FOR KFC MANAGER JOBS NOW!
Shift Supervisors
We’re looking for enthusiastic and flexible shift supervisors who want to provide fast, fun and friendly service to our customers. If that sounds like you, why not bring your talents and skills to us?
The responsibilities of the Shift Supervisor will include:
Interaction with customers: receiving orders, processing sales and monies, and managing customer issues. Training and motivating team members. Preparation of products. Maintaining quality of product. Monitoring all service equipment. Uncompromising standards in maintaining a clean and safe work environment (per Labor Board and OSHA regulations and Company standards), maintaining a clean parking lot, building exterior, dumpster and boardwalk, including removal of trash within containers to proper dumpster site(s). Unloading, stocking and maintaining required inventory level. Champions recognition and motivation efforts Preparing/making/transporting deposits, preparing proposed labor schedules, product projections, financials for store manager’s review/approval.

Quick Facts: KFC
KFC was founded in Louisville, Kentucky in 1952. More than 24,000 people work for KFC. Ingredients for KFC's secret spice is manufactured in different locations, so that nobody knows the entire recipe. KFC's famous paper bucket was actually created by Wendy's founder Dave Thomas, when he was a KFC franchisee.
